## Checklist

- [ ] Uses token variables (no hardcoded colors, spacing, or fonts)
- [ ] Includes `[data-theme="dark"]` override (colocated with component)
- [ ] Class name follows existing conventions (`.btn-*`, `.tag-*`, etc.)
- [ ] Example added/updated in `index.html`
- [ ] Tested in both light and dark mode
- [ ] Tested at all breakpoints (1920, 1440, 1024, 768)
- [ ] Focus-visible states included for interactive elements
- [ ] No class name collisions with existing components
- [ ] `docs/components/` markdown created or updated
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated
